description: This is simply a clean up bug. The convention when retrieving a record from the DB by id is to name the method <model>_get. The corresponding method for instance_type is instance_type_get_by_id
title: Inconsistent database API method naming for instance_types

comments.content: This is simply a clean up bug. The convention when retrieving a record from the DB by id is to name the method <model>_get. The corresponding method for instance_type is instance_type_get_by_id
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cerberus
